item.title: CVE-2024-1853|2024-03-14T22:13:57.283Z -- Zemena -- AntiLogger
item.description: Zemana AntiLogger v2.74.204.664 is vulnerable to an Arbitrary Process Termination vulnerability by triggering the 0x80002048 IOCTL code of the zam64.sys and zamguard64.sys drivers.
